plot: In the heart of an Ivy League institution, three naive transplants from rural Kansas find themselves working at the prestigious Brown University Bookstore. In the pilot, they attempt to hire a new cash register operator.
title: The Brown Bookstore
plot_es: In the heart of an Ivy League institution, three naive transplants from rural Kansas find themselves working at the prestigious Brown University Bookstore. In the pilot, they attempt to hire a new cash register operator.
plot_en: In the heart of an Ivy League institution, three naive transplants from rural Kansas find themselves working at the prestigious Brown University Bookstore. In the pilot, they attempt to hire a new cash register operator.
